Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaje se stara kuća u centru grada Splita - Manuš, 150m2, udaljenost od rive 300m. Kuća ima izuzetno veliki potencijal jer svojom konstrukcijom daje velike mogućnosti. Sastoji se od 3 etaže po 50m2, prizemlje je uređeno, kat i potkrovlje potrebna kompletno renoviranje. Mogućnost prizemlja prenamjene u poslovni prostor, a kat i potkrovlje za gradski život ili za bavljenje turizmom. S obzirom na lokaciju ove atraktivne nekretnine, odmah uz gradski naplatni parking pod rampom, gdje vlasnik nekretnine dobija povlaštenu kartu za parkiranje od grada, ova nekretnina sa svojim izuzetno velikim potencijalom daje ovoj nekretnini veliki značaj i prednost sličnim njoj. Cijena ove atraktivne nekretnine je 580.000 EUR Za sve ostale, detaljnije informacije, potreban je potpis Ugovora o posredovanju nekretninama Remax, a sve prema Zakonu o posredovanju nekretninama RH i Prema Zakonu o zaštiti podatka Prodavatelja. S obzirom da ovakvih atraktivnih nekretnina u centru grada Splita nema puno na ponudi, slobodno možete ODMAH zvati na 00385 91 2304 007 ili slati mail na m.anic@remax.hr FOR SALE  Old House in the Center of Split  Manuš, 150m², Just 300m from the Riva An old house with great potential is for sale in the city center of Split, in the Manuš neighborhood. The total area is 150m², and the property is located only 300 meters from the famous Riva promenade. The house has excellent potential thanks to its layout and structure, offering numerous possibilities. It consists of three floors, each 50m². The ground floor is renovated, while the first floor and attic require complete renovation. There is the possibility of converting the ground floor into a commercial space, while the upper floors are ideal for city living or for use as tourist accommodation. Due to its prime location, right next to the citys paid parking area with a barrier, where the property owner is entitled to a discounted residential parking permit issued by the city, this property stands out as a significant opportunity and offers a competitive edge compared to similar properties. **The asking price for this attractive property is €580,000.** For all additional and detailed information, it is necessary to sign a Real Estate Brokerage Agreement with Remax, in accordance with the Croatian Real Estate Brokerage Act and the Data Protection Law concerning the Seller. Given that there are very few properties like this available in the city center of Split, feel free to call immediately at +385 91 2304 007 or send an email to m.anic@remax.hr
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
